claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: Flowchart outlining a study cohort of adults ≥18 years (N=18,467), exclusions (n=3,264), resulting in an analyzable cohort (N=15,203) split into controls (N=13,385) and influenza cases (N=1,868), each further subdivided by vaccine type: RIV4, SD-IIV4, HD-IIV4+Adj-IV, and unvaccinated with respective counts. The figure only shows participant flow and vaccine group counts; it does not describe Flublok’s production platform, so it does not support the claim

detailed_analysis.reasoning: The figure only shows participant flow and vaccine group counts; it does not describe Flublok’s production platform, so it does not support the claim
